headline: Lockheed Martin (LMT): Exploring Valuation After Recent Modest Share Price Lift
summary: Lockheed Martin (LMT) stock has moved only slightly in recent days, leaving investors considering the valuation from a longer-term perspective. The company’s one-year return remains down; however, the broader trend is mixed. See our latest analysis for Lockheed Martin. Lockheed Martin’s recent share price saw a modest lift over the past month, but this follows a year where its total shareholder return is still down 15.2%. While short-term momentum has emerged, it has yet to shift the...

headline: Lockheed Martin and Belgium Celebrate Arrival of First Belgian F-35 Aircraft
summary: Belgium's first F-35A Lightning II aircraft to be stationed in country arrived at Florennes Air Base. Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) joined the arrival ceremony hosted by the Belgian Air Force at the base to celebrate the F-35's official incorporation into Belgian Air Force operations.

raw.headline: Lockheed Martin and Belgium Celebrate Arrival of First Belgian F-35 Aircraft
raw.summary: Belgium's first F-35A Lightning II aircraft to be stationed in country arrived at Florennes Air Base. Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) joined the arrival ceremony hosted by the Belgian Air Force at the base to celebrate the F-35's official incorporation into Belgian Air Force operations.

headline: Boeing Awarded Approximately $2.7 Billion in Multiyear Contracts for PAC‑3 Seeker Production
summary: Boeing [NYSE: BA] has been awarded a combination of multiyear contracts valued at approximately $2.7 billion to produce additional Patriot Advanced Capability‑3 (PAC‑3) seekers. Under the agreements, Boeing will deliver more than 3,000 seekers at rates of up to 750 units per year through 2030.

raw.headline: Boeing Awarded Approximately $2.7 Billion in Multiyear Contracts for PAC‑3 Seeker Production

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid LMT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Although Lockheed Martin (currently trading at $501.95 per share) has gained 5.6% over the last six months, it has trailed the S&P 500’s 22.9% return during that period. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
